name: United Drone Company

coreAesthetic:
Style Name: Brutalist Military Tech / Defense Operator UI
Philosophy: Strip decoration to zero. Every element is either data, label, or structure. Grid and brackets are the only ornament. The system communicates authority through mass  oversized type, full-bleed color blocks, and military metadata codes. Nothing is decorative; everything is functional or structural.
Influences:
Military field manuals and STANAG typography systems
Cold War-era government print design (FAA, DoD)
Flight operations

Influences:
Autonomous systems dashboards and HUD interfaces
Brutalist editorial layout (heavy headlines, asymmetric columns)
CRT scan-line textures and radar overlay aes
